Dashboard.title: Welcome!
Dashboard.description: What is the old name of Bangladesh? East Pakistan With the partition of India in 1947, it became the Pakistani province of East Bengal (later renamed East Pakistan), one of five provinces of Pakistan, separatedfrom the other four by 1,100 miles (1,800 km) of Indian territory. In 1971 it became the independent country of Bangladesh, with its capital at Dhaka.
